message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. We believe its worth surpasses $1500000. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, we propose an initial offer of $2000000. We are confident this reflects its true worth and anticipate your favorable response.

Hello Alice, Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on your product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
